Test Cases: Account number first character can't have space
Test Steps: 1) Enter space in the first character of the "Account number" field
Expected Result: An error message "Space are not allowed" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field

Test Cases: Minimum Transaction Value limit can't be empty
Test Steps: 1) Do not enter a value in "Minimum Transaction Value" field
Expected Result: An error message "Minimum Transaction Value must not be blank" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to next field

Test Cases: Number of transaction can't be empty
Test Steps: 1) Do not enter a value in "Number of Transaction" field
Expected Result: An error message "Number of transaction must not be blank" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to next field

Test Cases: The date can’t be a future date in "From Date" field
Test Steps: 1) Enter any future date after today’s date in the "From Date" field
Expected Result: Manger/ Customer can only add today’s date as a maximum date in "From Date" field

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field

Test Cases: From Date can’t be greater than To Date
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid date in the "To Date" field (02 May 2023)
Expected Result: An error message "From Date field must be less than To Date field" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Enter a valid date in the "From Date" field but greater than the "To Date" field (25 May 2023)
3) Press TAB and move to the next field

Test Cases: To Date Field can't be empty
Test Steps: 1) Do not enter a value in "To Date" field
Expected Result: An error message "To Date field must not be blank" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to next field

Test Cases: Manager/ Customer can view customized statement page entering valid data in all fields
Test Steps: 1) Enter a customer account no. is associated to the customer
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the customer
Expected Result: The manager/ customer successfully can view customized statement page

Test Steps: 2) Enter a valid "From Date" and "To Date"
3) Enter a valid "Amount Lower Limit"
4) Enter a valid "Number of Transactions"
5) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Manager/ Customer can’t view customized statement page if any field is empty
Test Steps: 1) Enter a customer account no. is associated to the customer
Expected Result: An error message "Please fill all fields" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Leave "From Date" and "To Date" fields empty
3) Enter a valid "Amount Lower Limit"
4) Enter a valid "Number of Transactions"
5) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Customer can't view customized statement not associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a customer account no. is not associated to the customer
Expected Result: An error message "Account does not exist" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Enter a valid "From Date" and "To Date"
3) Enter a valid "Amount Lower Limit"
4) Enter a valid "Number of Transactions"
5) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Customer can view customized statement associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a customer account no. is associated to the customer
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the customer
Expected Result: Customer can successfully view customized statment

Test Steps: 2) Enter a valid "From Date" and "To Date"
3) Enter a valid "Amount Lower Limit"
4) Enter a valid "Number of Transactions"
5) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Manager can’t view customized statement not associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a customer account no
Test Data: Accounts No. not associated to the manger
Expected Result: An error message "Account does not exist" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Enter a valid "From Date" and "To Date"
3) Enter a valid "Amount Lower Limit"
4) Enter a valid "Number of Transactions"
5) Click on the "Submit" button
